action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image features a series of pixelated, abstract shapes in various colors, including green, pink, purple, and orange, on a white background. The shapes resemble plus signs and T-shapes.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There are red, purple, yellow, and orange shapes arranged in a scattered pattern. Each shape is composed of small squares forming a cross or T-like structure.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image features a series of pixelated, abstract shapes in various colors, including green, pink, purple, and orange, on a white background. The shapes resemble plus signs and T-shapes.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any green shapes in your image?
